description: A compact makeshift steel cylinder designed for holding pressurized welding gases, welded together from sheet metal, with two sections; one for oxygen, and another one for acetylene.  It can contain much less gas for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.

A large makeshift steel cylinder designed for holding pressurized welding gases, with two sections; one for oxygen, and another one for acetylene.  It can contain much less gas for the same volume than its better-quality counterparts.
